1.description: Often used for very small help text or labels.

2.description: Often used for help text or small labels.

3.description: Often used for small body text or labels.

5.description: Often used for headings or labels.

6.description: Often used for headings or labels.

7.description: Used as the base for small headings.

8.description: Used as the base for medium-sized headings.

9.description: Used as the base for large headings.

10.description: Used as the base for very large headings.

base.description: Functions as the base of the type scale. Used for body text, headings or labels.

brand.description: Default font family for all text.

brand-expressive.description: Default serif font family for expressive text.

regular.description: Used for body text and labels

semibold.description: Used for headings, labels and highlighted body text.

semibold-italic.description: Used for expressive headings, labels and highlighted body text.

default.description: Default letter spacing for any text.

7.description: Used for small headings on desktop devices.

8.description: Used for medium-sized headings on desktop devices.

9.description: Used for large headings on desktop devices.

10.description: Used for very large headings on desktop devices.

7.description: Used for small headings on tablet devices.

8.description: Used for medium-sized headings on tablet devices.

9.description: Used for large headings on tablet devices.

10.description: Used for very large headings on tablet devices.

7.description: Used for small headings on mobile devices.

8.description: Used for medium-sized headings on mobile devices.

9.description: Used for large headings on mobile devices.

10.description: Used for large headings on mobile devices.

sm.description: This is the small body text style. It is used in both short paragraphs (no more than 4 lines) and is commonly used in components.

base.description: This is the standard body text style. It is used in both short and long paragraphs.

md.description: This is the medium body text style. It is used in mostly shorter paragraphs.

lg.description: This is the large body text style. It is used shorter paragraphs.

xl.description: This is the extra large body text style. It is used shorter paragraphs.

sm-uppercase.description: This text style is used globally when a short subtle small heading is needed.

md-uppercase.description: This text style is used globally when a short subtle medium-sized heading is needed.

sm.description: This text style is used for small headings.

md.description: This text style is used for medium-sized headings.

lg.description: This text style is used for large headings.

xl.description: This text style is used for extra large headings.

xs.description: Used for extra small and short text (no more than one line) in components.

sm.description: Used for small and short text (no more than one line) in components.

md.description: Used for short text (no more than one line) in components.

lg.description: Used for very short text (no more than a few words) in components.

xl.description: Used for very short text (no more than a few words) in components.

primary.description: Used as brand accent color on key components across the UI, such as prominent buttons, active states, overlays, graphics/logos.

on-primary.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary.

primary-variant.description: Used as accent color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary container.

primary-subtle.description: Used as color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary container variant.

primary-v1.description: Used as alternative brand accent color on key components across the UI, such as prominent buttons, active states, overlays, graphics/logos.

on-primary-v1.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v1.

primary-v1-variant.description: Used as alternative accent color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v1-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-variant-1 container.

primary-v1-subtle.description: Used as color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v1-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-container-v1.

primary-v2.description: Used as alternative brand accent color on key components across the UI, such as prominent buttons, active states, overlays, graphics/logos.

on-primary-v2.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v2.

primary-v2-variant.description: Used as alternative accent color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v2-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v2 container.

primary-v2-subtle.description: Used as color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v2-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-container-v2.

primary-v3.description: Used as alternative brand accent color on key components across the UI, such as prominent buttons, active states, overlays, graphics/logos.

on-primary-v3.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v3.

primary-v3-variant.description: Used as alternative accent color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v3-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v3 container.

primary-v3-subtle.description: Used as color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v3-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-container-v3.

primary-v4.description: Used as alternative brand accent color on key components across the UI, such as prominent buttons, active states, overlays, graphics/logos.

on-primary-v4.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v4.

primary-v4-variant.description: Used as alternative accent color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v4-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v4 container.

primary-v4-subtle.description: Used as color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v4-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-container-v4.

primary-v5.description: Used as alternative brand accent color on key components across the UI, such as prominent buttons, active states, overlays, graphics/logos.

on-primary-v5.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v5.

primary-v5-variant.description: Used as alternative accent color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v5-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-v5-container.

primary-v5-subtle.description: Used as color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v5-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-container-v5.

primary-v6.description: Used as alternative brand accent color on key components across the UI, such as prominent buttons, active states, overlays, graphics/logos.

on-primary-v6.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-variant-6.

primary-v6-variant.description: Used as alternative accent color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v6-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-variant-6 container.

primary-v6-subtle.description: Used as color on components across the UI that needs less emphasis than primary.

on-primary-v6-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of primary-container-v6.

on-surface.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of surface.

on-surface-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of surface when less emphasis is required.

on-surface-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of surface variant.

on-surface-variant-subtle.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of surface variant when less emphasis is required.

surface+1.description: Used for surfaces at elevation level +1.

surface+2.description: Used for surfaces at elevation level +2.

surface+3.description: Used for surfaces at elevation level +3.

surface+4.description: Used for surfaces at elevation level +4.

surface+5.description: Used for surfaces at elevation level +5.

divider.description: Used for high emphasis outlines when seperating content clearly is essential to improve usability.

divider-subtle.description: Used for low-emphasis dividers when seperating content clearly is more decorative than essential.

error.description: Used when error feedback needs to be communicated.

on-error.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of error.

error-container.description: Used when error feedback needs less emphasis.

on-error-container.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of error container.

error-container-variant.description: Used when error feedback needs less emphasis.

on-error-container-variant.description: Used on content such as icons and text that sits on top of error container variant.

sm.description: This text style is used for small expressive headings.

md.description: This text style is used for medium-sized expressive headings.

lg.description: This text style is used for large expressive headings.

xl.description: This text style is used for extra large expressive headings.

sm.description: This text style is used for small headings on desktop devices.

md.description: This text style is used for medium-sized headings on desktop devices.

lg.description: This text style is used for large headings on desktop devices.

sm.description: This text style is used for small headings on mobile devices.

md.description: This text style is used for medium-sized headings on mobile devices.

lg.description: This text style is used for large headings on mobile devices.
